    "advanced_days": 3,     # 提前提醒天数

    "customer_name": "客户姓名",
    "product_name": "产品名称",
    "content": "事件说明",
    "target_id": "321321",  # 跳转ID
    "msg": "事件内容"
}]

examples.title: Success-Response:
Success-Response:
Success-Response:
Success-Response:

Success 200.description: 注册验证码短信发送太频繁
预约额度超过产品剩余额度
最迟打款日期晚于产品的最迟打款日期
分成金额不能大于剩余待打款金额
无法邀请自己的旗下理财师
无法邀请其他机构的旗下理财师

examples.title: Request-Example:
Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
    "id": 12,
    "no": "8302183921889301",  # 客户编号
    "name": "张东",
    "type": {
        "id": 12,
        "text": "VIP客户"
    },
    "first_invest_time": "2017-12-16",
    "last_invest_time": "2017-11-16",
    "remark": "备注",
    "order_amount": {   # 成交金额
        "total": {  # 累计
            "rmb": 0,
            "dollar": 0
        },
        "existence": {  #  存续
            "rmb": 0,
            "dollar": 0
        }
    },
    "profit": {     # 收益    / 元
        "total": {  # 账面收益
            "rmb": 0,
            "dollar": 0
        },
        "finished": {   # 已分配收益
            "rmb": 0,
            "dollar": 0
        }
    },
    "existence_percent_by_profit_type": [   # 浮动/固定存续
        {"name": "fixed": "value": 0.12},
        {"name": "float": "value": 0.12},
    }],
    "existence_percent_by_currency": {  # 人民币/美元存续
        {"name": "rmb": "value": 0.12},
        {"name": "dollar": "value": 0.12},
    },
    "existence_percent_by_strategy": {  # 存续产品策略
        {"name": "主管多空": "value": 0.12},
        {"name": "基建": "value": 0.12},
    },
}

Request-Example:

{
    "name": "产品A"，
    "profit_type": 1,   # 产品类型 0：固定， 1：浮动

    "maximum_size": 33,     # 最大募集规模/万

    },

    "start_date": "2017-12-16T16:00:00",    # 产品成立日
    "end_date": "2017-12-16T16:00:00",    # 产品结束日

    "dividend_type": 1, # 分红方式

    "other_time_point": "其他时间节点",
    "collect_account_name": "募集账户名",
    "collect_account": "募集账号",
    "bank_name": "开户行",
    "remit_remark": "打款备注",
    "invest_info": "投资方向",
    "risk_info": "风控措施",
    "fee_info": "产品费用",
    "fee_sale": "销售费用",
    "max_fee_sale": "最高销售费用",

    "copy_product_id": 3,    # 用于复制的产品ID
}
